title: Názvy složek emailu v Thuderbird v angličtině.
creator: Johanku
content: Zdravím, už jsem to tady jednou psal, ale nedostal jsem odpověď. Nevím ani kdy se to stalo, ale v poštovním klientovi Thunderbird (v. 146.0.1.) se názvy složek u emailových adres na "seznam.cz" změnily z češtiny naaanglické, kromě "doručená pošta". U emailové adresy @gmail.com zůstaly v češtině. Kontaktoval jsem technickou podporu "Seznamu" a bylomi sděleno, že u nich je va serveru vše v Českém jazyce, že bude potřeba změnit nastavení v Thunderbirdu. To se pokouším už nějaku dobu, ale bohužel jsem nepřišel na to jak. Proto prosím o radu jak dostat názvy složek zase do češtiny. Předem děkují za ochotu a váš čas. Jenda
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:146.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/146.0 Viewer/98.9.8330.82;os:WIN 10 64 bit

title: Emails not being received by Gmail accounts
creator: sales323
content: I have been using our work Mozilla Thunderbird account for two years and in all that time we have been unable to send emails from our usual email address (sales@freunduk.com) to anyone with a Gmail account. We get no bouncebacks and no indication to say that the email has not been received. Everyone else with other types of email account such as Hotmail or Outlook etc get our emails, but for some reason Gmail is blocked. We send invoices, quotes etc from Mozilla and for anyone with a Gmail account, not receiving our email is very inconvenient. We have put customers on stop for non payment and then realised they haven't received our invoice via email because they have a Gmail address. Can anyone shed any light on the matter please? Is there a setting we are missing which needs changing? I have tried to search previous questions on the forum but nothing has been obvious. All help appreciated.
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/143.0.0.0 Safari/537.36;os:Windows 10

title: Thunderbird Install and Profile Transfer Did Not Include Sent FOlder Files
creator: jjcdennis
content: My old laptop crashed and burned, but I had a profile backup. I used the transfer tool to install the profiles on my new computer, but had a couple problems: 1- the calendar didn't transfer over. I fixed this by copy/paste Calendar-Data and calendar-data.sbd from the default-release folder . 2- No sent records were copied over. I tried copying over a sent.file (375 mb) and sent.msf from a different default-release folder (there were two default-release folders in the older profile backup, I'm not sure why). This did not update the new installation with the sent records. So my question is, how to I update the sent folder in the new build from a older backup, so that all the records are included. Win11 up to date with latest Thunderbird and Firefox versions. Thank you.
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:146.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/146.0;os:Win11 Pro and current Firefox;kb_visits_prior:["/en-US/kb/profiles-where-thunderbird-stores-user-data"]
